welcome_message_body: "Welcome to River Edge, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. Be sure to soak in the sights and attractions while you're here. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free, with limited bandwidth and time restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, JetBlue, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Airlines and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Airlines, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport offers domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities such as shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and amenities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Used for domestic flights for select airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals, serving both domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Exclusive terminal for JetBlue Airways

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Operated by British Airways and other international carriers

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Main hub for American Airlines

wifi.note: Complimentary access for 30 minutes, additional time can be purchased

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
